title.suffix: ➜ a Markdown directory tree will be generated automatically.
hideLabel: Hide folders or files by clicking or entering custom names:
inputPlaceholder: Please enter the complete file name
dropZoneTextFolder: 📂 Drag and drop a folder here, or click this area to select one.
dropZoneTextJson: 📄 Drag and drop a JSON file here, or click this area to select one.
note:
This website is a purely frontend application.
All operations are executed within your browser.
No data is uploaded or stored on any backend server, so you can use it with confidence.
onlySingleFile: Only a single .json file is supported for drag-and-drop.
invalidFormat: Invalid JSON format. Please check the file content.
requireJsonFile: Only one JSON file is allowed, and it must have a .json extension.
alert.noContent: No content generated yet. Unable to download!
